game.name: Houdini Indie
game.genres: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Video Production, Game Development
game.shortDescription: Houdini Indie's procedural node-based workflow offers a smarter way to create high quality game art. Houdini technology is used by AAA studios to take their games to the next level and now this procedural power is also available to indie game devs around the world.
